Package com.neu.prattle.controller

Class FriendController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neu.prattle.controller.FriendController
  • @Path("/friend")
public class FriendController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all incoming HTTP requests for the Friend model and FriendService

      • sendFriendRequest

        @POST
@Path("/create")
@Consumes("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendFriendRequest​(Friend friend)
        Sends a friend request, which is represented as a Friend object
        Parameters:
        friend - is the friend request
        Returns:
        a response indicating the success of the friend request

      • findAllFriends

        @GET
@Path("/{username}/friends")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findAllFriends​(@PathParam("username")
                                                java.lang.String username)
        Returns all of a User's Friends
        Parameters:
        username - is the username of a User
        Returns:
        a List of a User's Friends if that User has any, otherwise Optional.Empty()

      • respondToFriendRequest

        @PATCH
@Path("/{sender}/{recipient}/{isApproved}")
@Consumes("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response respondToFriendRequest​(@PathParam("sender")
                                                        java.lang.String sender,
                                                        @PathParam("recipient")
                                                        java.lang.String recipient,
                                                        @PathParam("isApproved")
                                                        java.lang.String isApproved)
        Allows a User to respond to a friend request
        Parameters:
        sender - is the username of the sender of the friend request
        recipient - is the username of the recipient of the friend request
        isApproved - is a String prepresenting whether the recipient approves of the friend request or not
        Returns:
        a Response indicating the success of the approval

      • removeFriend

        @DELETE
@Path("/{sender}/{recipient}/remove")
@Consumes("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeFriend​(@PathParam("sender")
                                              java.lang.String sender,
                                              @PathParam("recipient")
                                              java.lang.String recipient)
        Allows a User to remove a Friend
        Parameters:
        sender - is the username of the User wanting to remove a Friend
        recipient - is the username of the User to be removed as a Friend
        Returns:
        a Response indicating the success of the removal
